statements: SELECT * FROM interventions_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_date FROM interventions_data WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.7;
SELECT patient_id, intervention_name, intervention_date, effectiveness_score FROM interventions_data WHERE intervention_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT intervention_name FROM interventions_data ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM interventions_data WHERE intervention_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM interventions_data ORDER BY intervention_date DESC, effectiveness_score ASC;
SELECT patient_id, intervention_name FROM interventions_data WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.5;
SELECT intervention_name, COUNT(*) as num_interventions FROM interventions_data GROUP BY intervention_name HAVING num_interventions > 2 ORDER BY num_interventions DESC;
SELECT AVG(effectiveness_score) as avg_score FROM interventions_data WHERE intervention_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM interventions_data WHERE patient_id IN (1002, 1005, 1008, 1010) ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT intervention_name, success_rate FROM interventions WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_name, intervention_date FROM interventions ORDER BY intervention_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC

SELECT patient_name, age, intervention_name FROM patients JOIN interventions ON patients.patient_id = interventions.patient_id WHERE success_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY age DESC, intervention_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT patient_name, age, intervention_name, success_rate FROM patients LEFT JOIN interventions ON patients.patient_id = interventions.patient_id WHERE intervention_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC, success_rate DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(success_rate) AS avg_success_rate FROM interventions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_patients DESC
SELECT * FROM interventions;
SELECT intervention_name, effectiveness_score FROM interventions ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM program_evaluation WHERE evaluation_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT intervention_name, satisfaction_score FROM interventions JOIN program_evaluation ON interventions.intervention_id = program_evaluation.intervention_id WHERE satisfaction_score > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM interventions ORDER BY intervention_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT intervention_name, effectiveness_score FROM interventions WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM program_evaluation WHERE satisfaction_score < 3.0 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, intervention_name, satisfaction_score FROM patient_records PR JOIN program_evaluation PE ON PR.patient_id = PE.patient_id JOIN interventions I ON PR.intervention_id = I.intervention_id;
SELECT * FROM interventions;
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_type FROM interventions WHERE intervention_id = 1;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';

SELECT intervention_name, program_name, patient_name, outcome_value FROM interventions JOIN outcomes ON interventions.intervention_id = outcomes.intervention_id JOIN programs ON programs.program_id = outcomes.program_id JOIN patients ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM interventions;
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_type FROM interventions WHERE intervention_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT outcome_name, outcome_description, outcome_value FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_value >= 0.5 ORDER BY outcome_value DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_type, program_description FROM programs WHERE program_type = 'Mental Health' AND program_id IN (SELECT program_id FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_value > 0.7);
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT intervention_name, description, intervention_type FROM interventions WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.5;
SELECT provider_name, specialization, location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, evaluation_date, outcome_evaluation FROM program_evaluation WHERE effectiveness_score >= 0.8;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialization, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY specialization, provider_name;
SELECT intervention_name, description, intervention_type, effectiveness_score FROM interventions WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8 ORDER BY intervention_name;

SELECT patient_name, age, date_of_intervention, outcome FROM patients JOIN patient_intervention_history ON patients.patient_id = patient_intervention_history.patient_id ORDER BY date_of_intervention DESC;
SELECT program_name, evaluation_date, outcome_evaluation FROM program_evaluation WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.7 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC, program_name;
